All Classes

Class Description
AbstractToken<Symbol extends java.lang.Enum<Symbol>>
This class encapsulates the properties of a language token.
AddingExpr
The abstract syntax tree node for an adding expression.
ArrayType
This class encapsulates the language concept of an array type in the programming language CPRL.
ArrayTypeDecl
The abstract syntax tree node for an array type declaration.
Assembler
Assembler for the CPRL Virtual Machine.
AssignmentStmt
The abstract syntax tree node for an assignment statement.
AST
Base class for all abstract syntax tree classes.
AST
Base class for all abstract syntax trees
BinaryExpr
Base class for all binary expressions.
BitUtil
This class encapsulates several bit manipulation utility methods.
BranchingReduction
Improves branching instructions where a nonconditional branch is used to branch over a conditional branch (which can occur when an exit statement appears at the end of a loop).
ByteUtil
Methods to convert integers and characters to byte representations, and vice versa.
CharUtil
Utilities for recognizing binary and hexadecimal digits.
CodeGenException
Class for exceptions encountered during code generation.
Compiler
Compiler for the CPRL programming language.
CompilerException
Superclass for all compiler exceptions.
Constants
Class of CVM-related constants.
ConstDecl
The abstract syntax tree node for a constant declaration.
ConstFolding
Replaces runtime arithmetic on constants with compile-time arithmetic.
ConstNeg
Performs a special type of constant folding by replacing an instruction sequence of the form LDCINT x, NEG with LDCINT -x.
ConstraintException
Class for exceptions encountered during constraint analysis.
ConstValue
The abstract syntax tree node for a constant value expression, which is either a literal or a declared constant identifier representing a literal.
CVM
This class implements a virtual machine for the programming language CPRL.
Declaration
Base class for all CPRL declarations (constants, variables, procedures, etc.).
DeclarativePart
The abstract syntax tree node for the declarative part of a program.
Disassembler
Translates CVM machine code into CVM assembly language.
ElsifPart
The AST for an elsif part of an if statement.
ErrorHandler
This class handles the reporting of error messages.
ExitStmt
The abstract syntax tree node for an exit statement.
Expression
Base class for all CPRL expressions.
FunctionCall
The abstract syntax tree node for a function call expression.
FunctionDecl
The abstract syntax tree node for a function declaration.
IdTable
The identifier table (also known as a symbol table) is used to hold attributes of identifiers in the programming language CPRL.
IfStmt
The abstract syntax tree node for an if statement.
IncDec
Replaces addition of 1 with increment and subtraction of 1 with decrement.
IncDec2
Replaces addition of 1 to a variable with increment and subtraction of 1 from a variable with decrement.
InitialDecl
Base class for all initial declarations.
Instruction
This abstract class implements common methods for the abstract syntax tree of a single assembly language instruction.
InstructionADD
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction ADD.
InstructionALLOC
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction ALLOC.
InstructionBG
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction BG.
InstructionBGE
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction BGE.
InstructionBL
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction BL.
InstructionBLE
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction BLE.
InstructionBNZ
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction BNZ.
InstructionBR
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction BR.
InstructionBZ
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction BZ.
InstructionCALL
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction CALL.
InstructionCMP
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction CMP.
InstructionDEC
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction DEC.
InstructionDEFINT
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language pseudo instruction DEFINT.
InstructionDIV
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction DIV.
InstructionGETCH
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction GETCH.
InstructionGETINT
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction GETINT.
InstructionHALT
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction HALT.
InstructionINC
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction INC.
InstructionLDCB
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction LDCB.

This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction LDCB0.
InstructionLDCB1
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction LDCB1.

This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction LDCCH.
InstructionLDCINT
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction LDCINT.
InstructionLDCINT0
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction LDCINT0.
InstructionLDCINT1
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction LDCINT1.
InstructionLDCSTR
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction LDCSTR.
InstructionLDGADDR
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction LDGADDR.
InstructionLDLADDR
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction LDLADDR.
InstructionLOAD
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction LOAD.
InstructionLOAD2B
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction LOAD2B.
InstructionLOADB
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction LOADB.
InstructionLOADW
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction LOADW.
InstructionMOD
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction MOD.
InstructionMUL
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction MUL.
InstructionNEG
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction NEG.
InstructionNoArgs
This class serves as a base class for the abstract syntax tree for an assembly language instruction with no arguments.
InstructionNOT
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction NOT.
InstructionOneArg
This class serves as a base class for the abstract syntax tree for an assembly language instruction with one argument.
InstructionPROC
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction PROC.
InstructionPROGRAM
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction PROGRAM.
InstructionPUTBYTE
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction PUTBYTE.
InstructionPUTCH
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction PUTCH.
InstructionPUTEOL
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction PUTEOL.
InstructionPUTINT
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction PUTINT.
InstructionPUTSTR
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction PUTSTR.
InstructionRET
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction RET.
InstructionSHL
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction SHL.
InstructionSHR
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction SHR.
InstructionSTORE
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction STORE.
InstructionSTORE2B
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction STORE2B.
InstructionSTOREB
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction STOREB.
InstructionSTOREW
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction STOREW.
InstructionSUB
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction SUB.
InternalCompilerException
Class for exceptions encountered within the compiler.
LoadSpecialConstants
Replaces LDCB 0 with LDCB0, LDCB 1 with LDCB1, LDCINT 0 with LDCINT0, and LDCINT 1 with LDCINT1.
LogicalExpr
The abstract syntax tree node for a logical expression.
LoopContext
This class provides access to an enclosing loop context required by exit statements for constraint analysis code generation.
LoopStmt
The abstract syntax tree node for a loop statement.
MultiplyingExpr
The abstract syntax tree node for a multiplying expression.
NamedDecl
Interface for a named declaration, which can be either a "single" variable declaration or a parameter declaration.
NamedValue
The abstract syntax tree node for a named value.
NegationExpr
The abstract syntax tree node for a negation expression.
NotExpr
The abstract syntax tree node for a not expression.
OpCode
The set of opcodes for the CPRL virtual machine
Optimization
Perform peephole optimization on the list of instructions starting with the instruction at the specified position in the list and looking at that instruction plus the next several instructions.
Optimizations
This class is used to retrieve the list of all optimizations.
OptimizationUtil
Utility class for shift-related optimizations.
OutputStmt
Base class with common code for write and writeln statements.
ParameterDecl
The abstract syntax tree node for a parameter declaration.
Parser
This class uses recursive descent to perform syntax analysis of the CPRL source language and to generate an abstract syntax tree.
Parser
This class uses recursive descent to perform syntax analysis of the source language.
ParserException
Class for exceptions encountered during parsing.
Position
This class encapsulates the concept of a position in a source file, where the position is characterized by an ordered pair of integers: a line number relative to the source file and a character number relative to that line.
PreprocessorException
Class for exceptions encountered during preprocessing phase of the assembler.
ProcedureCallStmt
The abstract syntax tree node for a procedure call statement.
ProcedureDecl
The abstract syntax tree node for a procedure declaration.
Program
The abstract syntax tree node for a CPRL program.
Program
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for an assembly language program.
ReadStmt
The abstract syntax tree node for a read statement.
RelationalExpr
The abstract syntax tree node for a relational expression.
ReturnStmt
The abstract syntax tree node for a return statement.
Scanner
Performs lexical analysis for the CPRL programming language.
Scanner
Performs lexical analysis for CVM assembly language.
ScannerException
Class for exceptions encountered during scanning.
ScopeLevel
An enum class for the two declaration scope levels in CPRL.
ShiftLeft
Replaces multiplication by a power of 2 times a variable with left shift.
ShiftLeftRight
Replaces multiplication by a power of 2 with left shift and division by a power of two with right shift where possible.
SingleVarDecl
The abstract syntax tree node for a single variable declaration.
Source
This class encapsulates the source file reader.
Statement
Base class for all CPRL statements.
StatementPart
The abstract syntax tree node for the statement part of a program.
StringUtil
Utility class for formatting strings.
SubprogramContext
This class provides access to an enclosing subprogram context required by return statements for constraint analysis and code generation.
SubprogramDecl
Base class for CPRL procedures and functions.
Symbol
This class encapsulates the symbols (also known as token types) of the programming language CPRL.
Symbol
This class encapsulates the symbols (also known as token types) for the CVM assembly language.
Token
Instantiates the generic class AbstractToken for CPRL symbols.
Token
Instantiates the generic class AbstractToken for CVM assembly language symbols.
Type
This class encapsulates the language types for the programming language CPRL.
UnaryExpr
Base class for all unary expressions.
VarDecl
The abstract syntax tree node for a variable declaration.
Variable
The abstract syntax tree node for a variable, which is any named variable that can appear on the left hand side of an assignment statement.
WritelnStmt
The abstract syntax tree node for a writeln statement.
WriteStmt
The abstract syntax tree node for a write statement.
